title: Indian visa application centre in Dhaka to close at 2:00pm today
body: In view of the ongoing security situation, the Indian Visa Application Centre in Dhaka will close at 2:00pm today. ‘In view of the on-going security situation, we wish to bring to your kind notice that IVAC JFP Dhaka will be closed at 2:00pm today,’ said a notification issued by the IVAC in Dhaka. All applicants with appointment slots scheduled for submission on the day will be rescheduled for a later date. The Indian Visa Application Centre at Jamuna Future Park in Dhaka is the main, integrated center for all Indian visa services in the capital.
